GR13kirtm_au:0: PADA MARKERS For a four-pada verse:

GR13kirtm_au:26: bhadrametattvayā pṛṣṭaṃ % śṛṇu jñānaṃ mahodayam // KirT_1.11 //
GR13kirtm_au:32: yadyevaṃ sa paśustāvat- $ kīdṛśo badhyate katham &
GR13kirtm_au:45: tataḥ sukhādikaṃ kṛtsnaṃ $ bhogaṃ bhuṅkte svakarmataḥ &
GR13kirtm_au:48: sarvajñaḥ sa śivo yadvat % kiñcijjñatvavivarjitaḥ // KirT_1.21 //
GR13kirtm_au:50: evaṃ kramādvibaddhaḥ san % mucyate kramayogataḥ // KirT_1.22 //
GR13kirtm_au:51: kevalaḥ sakalaḥ śuddhas $ tryavasthaḥ puruṣaḥ smṛtaḥ &

GR13kirtm_au:60: īdṛgrūpaṃ smṛtaṃ tābhyāṃ % śuddhāśuddhaṃ yathārthataḥ // KirT_2.3 //
GR13kirtm_au:62: yathāsminna nimittaṃ hi % tathā naiva śivātmanoḥ // KirT_2.4 //
GR13kirtm_au:65: sa māyāntargataḥ prokto % vyāpakaśca tvayā vibho // KirT_2.5 //
GR13kirtm_au:69: muktyarthaṃ sa paśurbaddho $ nānyathā sāsya jāyate &
GR13kirtm_au:70: yāvaccharīrasaṃśleṣo % na sañjāto na bhogabhuk // KirT_2.7 //
GR13kirtm_au:79: guṇastadvyatirikto vā % malo brūhi kimātmakaḥ // KirT_2.11 //
GR13kirtm_au:82: māyā no mohinī proktā % svataḥ kāryātprakāśikā // KirT_2.12 //
GR13kirtm_au:84: malaṃ vidārya cidvyaktim % ekadeśe karotyasau // KirT_2.13 //
GR13kirtm_au:85: sthitā prakāśikā kāryān $ mohakatve na saṃsthitā &
GR13kirtm_au:90: māyotthaṃ bandhanaṃ tasya % sanimittaṃ pravartate // KirT_2.16 //
GR13kirtm_au:92: tasmānmāyā malo naiva % vyatiriktaḥ sa yuktitaḥ // KirT_2.17 //
GR13kirtm_au:93: māyākāryaṃ samastaṃ syāt $ kuto 'nyaḥ sahajo malaḥ &
GR13kirtm_au:98: sa cāvidyādiparyāya- % bhedaiḥ siddho mate mate // KirT_2.20 //
GR13kirtm_au:100: pāśyādivṛttayo yāstu % tasya bhedāḥ prakīrtitāḥ // KirT_2.21 //
GR13kirtm_au:101: male sati bhavantyetā $ bhoktṛtvaṃ ca na kevalam &

GR13kirtm_au:104: ātmanaḥ kiṃ na dharmo 'sau $ yuktitaḥ kalpyate malaḥ &
GR13kirtm_au:108: tasya dharmo na dharmatve % pariṇāmaḥ sphuṭo bhavet // KirT_2.24 //
GR13kirtm_au:109: ciddharme puṃsi no dharmo $ yadi syātpariṇāmavān &
GR13kirtm_au:114: sahajaprakṣaye prāpte $ tasya nāśo na kiṃ bhavet &
GR13kirtm_au:116: vibhorapi malasyāsya % tacchakteḥ kriyate vadhaḥ // KirT_2.27 //
GR13kirtm_au:121: sahajā kālikā tāmre $ tatkṣayānna ca tatkṣayaḥ &
GR13kirtm_au:125: tathā na tadviṣaṃ kṣīṇam $ evaṃ puṃso malakṣayaḥ &
GR13kirtm_au:126: phalaṃ katakavṛkṣasya % kṣiptaṃ sakaluṣe jale // KirT_2.32 //
GR13kirtm_au:130: bhoktṛtvaṃ malataḥ proktam $ abhilāṣānna kiṃ bhavet &
GR13kirtm_au:131: sa ca rāgādyato rāgo % vaktavyo 'tra malena kim // KirT_3.1 //
GR13kirtm_au:134: abhilāṣastanau satyāṃ % sā tanuḥ kena hetunā // KirT_3.2 //
GR13kirtm_au:136: cauryaṃ hi bījamāpekṣya % yathā nigaḍabandhanam // KirT_3.3 //
GR13kirtm_au:144: karmārjanaṃ tanau satyāṃ % sṛṣṭikāle tanuḥ kutaḥ // KirT_3.6 //
GR13kirtm_au:147: yadyanādi na saṃsiddhaṃ % vaicitryaṃ kena hetunā // KirT_3.7 //
GR13kirtm_au:149: tathānādiḥ śivaḥ kartā % sarvasya jagataḥ sthitaḥ // KirT_3.8 //
GR13kirtm_au:151: śivaḥ kartā tvayā proktaḥ $ sa kathaṃ gamyate prabho &
GR13kirtm_au:155: evaṃ śivo hyamūrto 'pi % kurute kāryamicchayā // KirT_3.10 //
GR13kirtm_au:156: icchaiva karaṇaṃ tasya $ yathā sadyogino matā &
GR13kirtm_au:158: vyāpāro na ca dṛśyeta kāryamicchā pratīyate // KirT_3.11 //
GR13kirtm_au:160: asti heturataḥ kaścit % karma cet na hyacetanam // KirT_3.12 //
GR13kirtm_au:161: proktaḥ sa niṣkalaḥ sthūlas $ tathā sakalaniṣkalaḥ &
GR13kirtm_au:164: niṣkalaḥ sa kathaṃ jñeyaḥ $ sakalo 'pi pumāṃstadā &
GR13kirtm_au:165: dvisvabhāvastathā yo 'nyo % viruddhaḥ sa parasparam // KirT_3.14 //
GR13kirtm_au:168: niṣkalaṃ lakṣyate śaktyā % sūkṣmaṃ viṣavikāravat // KirT_3.15 //
GR13kirtm_au:171: mantrātmikāḥ kalāstasya $ te ca mantrāḥ śivātmikāḥ &
GR13kirtm_au:172: taiḥ prakalpya śarīraṃ svaṃ % śuddhākṣādhyāsitaṃ mahat // KirT_3.17 //
GR13kirtm_au:175: yathaiva yoginaḥ śaktir $ grahaṇe mocane 'pi hi &
GR13kirtm_au:176: tadvadevātra boddhavyaṃ % grahaṇaṃ mocanaṃ vibhoḥ // KirT_3.19 //
GR13kirtm_au:179: dvisvabhāvagato yo 'nyo $ devaḥ prokto na niṣkalaḥ &
GR13kirtm_au:182: yogo na lakṣyahīnatvān % na nāḍī na ca dhāraṇā // KirT_3.22 //
GR13kirtm_au:190: śuddhe 'dhvani śivaḥ kartā % prokto 'nanto 'site prabhuḥ // KirT_3.26 //
GR13kirtm_au:196: prabodhikā ca sā śaktiḥ % sarvagā paripaṭhyate // KirT_4.1 //
GR13kirtm_au:197: anyeṣāṃ sannikṛṣṭāpi $ bodhaṃ sā kurute na kim &
GR13kirtm_au:202: rāgadveṣau na cārkasya $ tatheśasya na tau yataḥ &
GR13kirtm_au:203: adhikārānniyogo 'sya % na niyogaṃ vinā sthitiḥ // KirT_4.4 //
GR13kirtm_au:206: sarvajñatvaṃ tanau satyām % anantasya na yujyate // KirT_4.5 //
GR13kirtm_au:213: tatsthaṃ sarpaṃ viṣaṃ yadvat % tadgataṃ na vibādhate // KirT_4.8 //
GR13kirtm_au:217: mantraśaktyā yathā deho % vidhṛtastiṣṭhate ciram // KirT_4.10 //
GR13kirtm_au:219: evaṃ tacchaktisāmarthyād % āste tasya vapuryataḥ // KirT_4.11 //
GR13kirtm_au:221: tantrairupakṛtaḥ kalyo % yathā dehagato rasaḥ // KirT_4.12 //
GR13kirtm_au:223: yathā bheṣajasāmarthyād % aśaktānāṃ balaṃ param // KirT_4.13 //
GR13kirtm_au:225: tena sāmarthyayogena % yoniṃ prerayate kṣaṇāt // KirT_4.14 //
GR13kirtm_au:230: vikārātsarvanāśaḥ syād % vikāro na jagatkatham // KirT_4.16 //
GR13kirtm_au:233: svato na vikṛtistasmād % ananto 'syāḥ pracodakaḥ // KirT_4.17 //
GR13kirtm_au:237: sā śaktiḥ preritā tena % nityaṃ kāryakarī bhavet // KirT_4.19 //
GR13kirtm_au:243: kāraṇaṃ tena sā jñeyā $ sthūlasyāsya samantataḥ &
GR13kirtm_au:244: tasmātkalā tuṭiḥ saṃsthā % bodhinī hyabhilāṣakṛt // KirT_4.22 //
GR13kirtm_au:247: tebhyo bhūtāni jātāni sarvamīśaḥ sṛjatyadhaḥ // KirT_4.23 //
GR13kirtm_au:259: na dehena vinā muktir $ na bhogaścitkriyāguruḥ &
GR13kirtm_au:264: śivasya samavetatvāt % sarvadaiva sthitā paśau // KirT_5.1 //
GR13kirtm_au:266: kālo vā sa ca kaḥ prokto % yadi kālaḥ śivena kim // KirT_5.2 //
GR13kirtm_au:272: nipāto bhayado yadvad $ vastunaḥ sahasā bhavet &
GR13kirtm_au:279: tannipātasya saḥ kālaḥ % karmaṇāṃ tulyataiva ca // KirT_5.8 //
GR13kirtm_au:280: tulyatvaṃ karmaṇaḥ kālaḥ $ kṣīṇaṃ vā yadi vāsamam &
GR13kirtm_au:282: evaṃ sūkṣmaṃ samānatvaṃ yasminkāle tadaiva sā // KirT_5.9 //
GR13kirtm_au:284: karmāṃśo yo 'dhikaḥ pūrvaṃ % bhogadastvitaraḥ punaḥ // KirT_5.10 //
GR13kirtm_au:285: samatve sati yo bhogaḥ $ kathaṃ tasya prajāyate &
GR13kirtm_au:286: miśraṃ vārambhakaṃ karma % same bhogastadā na hi // KirT_5.11 //
GR13kirtm_au:290: sa pāta iti mantavyas % tasya bhaktirvilakṣaṇā // KirT_5.13 //
GR13kirtm_au:298: prabhuratra śivo jñeyaḥ % prabhutvaṃ kiṃ tuṭermatam // KirT_5.17 //
GR13kirtm_au:300: sati kāle prabhutvaṃ syāt % padmabodhe yathā raveḥ // KirT_5.18 //
GR13kirtm_au:301: na ca kālādṛte tatra $ vikāsaḥ pratipadyate &
GR13kirtm_au:304: evaṃ yadyapi tulyatvaṃ % karmaṇaḥ kāla eva saḥ \
GR13kirtm_au:306: ekā satī bahūnāṃ sā $ kathaṃ bodhaṃ karoti cet &
GR13kirtm_au:310: evaṃ tacchaktisaṃyogād % dīkṣā yadi ca saṃsthitā // KirT_5.22 //
GR13kirtm_au:312: tirobhāvakarī śaktir % yadi tasya na nirvṛtiḥ // KirT_5.23 //
GR13kirtm_au:313: tathā karotu sa svāmī $ yathāsau nānyathā bhavet &
GR13kirtm_au:319: prakāśya yāti vidyudvat % sā śaktiḥ puṃprabodhinī // KirT_5.26 //
GR13kirtm_au:322: tatra sthitasya tasyeha $ vāsanā saiva jāyate &
GR13kirtm_au:323: tadyuktasya vimokṣaḥ syād % ātmano nirvikalpakaḥ // KirT_5.28 //
GR13kirtm_au:325: ānarthakyaprasaṅgaḥ syād % yadi muktirna sā bhavet // KirT_5.29 //
GR13kirtm_au:329: dvijādivarṇaniśreṇī % sā ca mocayati sphuṭam // KirT_5.31 //
GR13kirtm_au:332: dvijātayastu ye varṇā % nyūnādhikatayā sthitāḥ // KirT_6.1 //
GR13kirtm_au:333: saṃskāro 'pi yadaivaṃ syāt $ phalamevaṃ na kiṃ bhavet &
GR13kirtm_au:336: na jāterna śarīrasya $ saṃskāraḥ prāṇino mataḥ &
GR13kirtm_au:342: kartavyo 'nugraho deva % sa ca saṃskārapūrvakaḥ // KirT_6.5 //
GR13kirtm_au:343: saṃskāreṇaiva muktiḥ syāt $ proktā tantre yadā tadā &
GR13kirtm_au:347: keciccātra kriyāyogyās % teṣāṃ muktistathaiva hi // KirT_6.7 //
GR13kirtm_au:349: evaṃ yeṣāṃ yathā prokto % mokṣasteneśayojanāt // KirT_6.8 //
GR13kirtm_au:351: dīkṣayaiva na mokṣaḥ syād % upāyaḥ sa niyāmakaḥ // KirT_6.9 //
GR13kirtm_au:353: ekaḥ kasmādupāyo na % proktastena yadanyathā // KirT_6.10 //
GR13kirtm_au:355: ajñatvānna ca doṣo 'sti % jñatvāddoṣo mahānbhavet // KirT_6.11 //
GR13kirtm_au:356: tena teṣāṃ vimuktiḥ syād $ dīkṣayā bhaktiyogataḥ &
GR13kirtm_au:357: ye 'tra śaktā na teṣāṃ tu % śodhyāsteṣāṃ prakāśayet // KirT_6.12 //
GR13kirtm_au:359: anyathā sthitibhaṅgaḥ syāt % sthitiścoktā śivāgame // KirT_6.13 //
GR13kirtm_au:360: tadabhāve na kiñcitsyāt $ tenāyaṃ niyamaḥ sthitaḥ &
GR13kirtm_au:364: viśleṣo 'pi na dṛśyeta % adṛṣṭatvātkathaṃ vada // KirT_6.15 //
GR13kirtm_au:377: bhaviṣyadapi saṃruddhaṃ % yenedaṃ taddhi bhogataḥ // KirT_6.20 //

GR13kirtm_au:381: pāśamuktasya yaccihnaṃ $ svalpamapyatra kiṃ na tat &

GR13kirtm_au:384: prāguktaṃ yojanaṃ tasya % tadyuktyā grāhapūrvakam // KirT_6.23 //
GR13kirtm_au:386: mahānatra virodhaḥ syāt % kathametadbravīhi me // KirT_6.24 //
